description: Julie Night really comes alive as a submissive and is one of the toughest pain sluts we know. Locked inside a small cage down in the scary Armory basement, she awaits her tormentor, Sandra Romain. Nothing is made easy for Julie and she must try hard to please Sandra with her tricky games and punishments. As her final act of submission, she is fucked in the ass while suspended sideways.
title: Sandra Romain and Julie Night
